episodes.title: The Secret History of David E. Taylor's First Church | Resurrection Media Ministries (Pt. 2)
episodes.description:
The disturbing truth of David E. Taylor’s first church, Resurrection Media Ministries, is proof that David E. Taylor has always been a cult leader.

Please note this is a condensed version of this story — some details were omitted due to time constraints.

- ⚠️ Disclaimer: This documentary is for educational and journalistic purposes only.
All claims are supported by publicly available records, verified sources, and firsthand testimony.
The content represents research and opinion, not legal conclusions.

- 🎞️ Footage Courtesy: All footage not otherwise sourced on-screen is owned by Joshua Media Ministries, aside from royalty free stock footage and public-domain materials.

🎥 Watch Part 1: “The Scam Starts Here” 
🔔 Subscribe for future episodes, FBI updates, and short form content.

episodes.title: Full Courtroom Audio: Judge Denies Bond for David E. Taylor (Federal Hearing – Oct. 17 2025)
episodes.description:
Official courtroom audio from David E. Taylor’s federal bond hearing before the magistrate judge on October 17, 2025.

The judge explains her decision to deny bond, citing concerns outlined in the government’s proffer and describing why she considers Taylor a danger to the community.

🎧 This is the full, unedited court audio obtained through PACER and released for educational and public-record purposes.

Stay informed as the case continues. Subscribe to Cult DET for the latest  updates and deep dives.

#DavidETaylor #CourtAudio #CultDET #FederalCourt #FBI #JMMI #KOGGC #TrueCrime #LegalAudio

episodes.title: David E. Taylor: A Fraud from the Start? | Memphis, TN (Pt. 1)
episodes.description:
Followers were told David E. Taylor left a gangster life behind at 17 after Jesus appeared to him. But was that ever true? This is Part 2 of an investigative series exposing David E. Taylor and his ministry. Subscribe for more in-depth episodes as the story unfolds.

episodes.title: Who Is David E. Taylor, Really? | Documentary (Intro)
episodes.description:
All the way from his early roots in Memphis, TN to the FBI raids in Aug. 2025. Follow us as we uncover the TRUE story of David E. Taylor, the leader of JMMI and KOGGC. 

Each episode dives into a new era and exposes another hidden truth about David E. Taylor. The deeper we go, the darker it gets — and this is only the beginning.
